patches_desc: Choose up to 3 alphabets, and up to 2 characters or quotes:
notification_bar_text: You can only choose to 3x alphabets, and up to 2 characters or quotes.
discard_change: Do you want to discard all the change?
image_desc: Tap the image below, then hold the image for approximately 3 seconds, and select 'Save to Photos'.
reminder_one: Our gifts are made-to-order. Please visit our pop-up store and present this image along with Pacific Place Offices app to our staff for redemption.
reminder_two: <underline>Daily quota</underline> applies on a first- come, first-served basis while stock lasts.
reminder_three: Each person is entitled to a <underline>maximum of ONE redemption</underline> while stocks last.
